synopsis.text:
Mirror worlds, mysterious girls, and giant robots collide in this thrilling anime adventure! When Nobita and his robotic cat companion, Doraemon, stumble upon peculiar metal blocks that fall from the sky, they embark on a secret mission to construct a colossal robot, the Zandacross, in an alternate mirror world. Unbeknownst to them, a mysterious red-haired girl named Lilulu has her sights set on the powerful automaton.

As the robot army marches towards Earth, intending to enslave humanity, Lilulu reveals her connection to the metallic menace. Despite her initial intentions, she joins forces with Nobita, Doraemon, and their friends to put an end to the impending invasion. With the fate of mankind resting in their hands, the unlikely group of heroes must band together to stop the Robot Empire and safeguard Earth from a future of servitude. Prepare for an exhilarating journey filled with action, friendship, and the unwavering determination to protect the planet!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
